allow: Bash(curl -s -X POST "https://api.supabase.com/v1/projects/bxehziozdzaixiwzeqwa/database/query" -H "Authorization: Bearer sbp_de488605e60a18e3e38e6034b941cb0fb4c077c6" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{""query"": ""CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee_address \(id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid\(\), employee_id UUID REFERENCES employees\(id\) ON DELETE CASCADE NOT NULL, organization_id UUID REFERENCES organizations\(id\) ON DELETE CASCADE NOT NULL, city_name VARCHAR\(100\), city_code VARCHAR\(20\), street VARCHAR\(200\), house_number VARCHAR\(20\), apartment VARCHAR\(20\), entrance VARCHAR\(10\), postal_code VARCHAR\(10\), phone VARCHAR\(20\), po_box VARCHAR\(20\), po_box_city VARCHAR\(100\), po_box_postal_code VARCHAR\(10\), valid_from DATE NOT NULL, valid_to DATE, changed_by UUID, change_reason TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW\(\), updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW\(\)\);""}')
